title: In a world first, RSV vaccines wins FDA approval for adults 60 and up
description: It's an achievement decades in the making, and more vaccines are in the pipeline.

title: As Alexa flounders, Amazon hopes homegrown generative AI can find it revenue
description: With voice assistants on the brink of death, Amazon targets Alexa large language model.

title: Luke’s Awakening fan art merges Star Wars with Zelda to delightful 8-bit effect
description: Game Boy Color pixel art mashes up Star Wars and Zelda into a faux game we wish was real.

title: Apple Q2 earnings are down, as everything but iPhones is harder to sell
description: Nothing compares to those sweet Apple Silicon-powered quarters of yore.

title: Google makes the Pixel Fold official
description: After years of delays, Google's foldable is finally confirmed.

title: Googlers angry about CEO’s $226M pay after cuts in perks and 12,000 layoffs
description: Sundar Pichai compared to Lord Farquaad as employees share memes about CEO pay.

title: Snoop Dogg on AI risk: “Sh–, what the f—?”
description: The music legend expressed his concerns during a Milken Institute panel with Larry Jackson.

title: “Are you still in business?”—Hyper support ghosts customers, spurring outrage
description: Recall claims and RMA requests went unanswered, orders unfulfilled.

title: Microsoft barrels ahead with AI plans, opens up Bing Chat preview to everyone
description: Microsoft also plans third-party plugins, more images, and other enhancements.

title: Giraffes, despite a relatively small brain, can handle statistics
description: This sort of behavior has previously only been seen in primates and parrots.

title: We’re in love with the new Star Wars deckbuilding game
description: Easy to learn, quick to play, and super fun—this one's a keeper.

title: 90,000 old BMWs too dangerous to drive due to airbag recall, maker says
description: Aging Takata airbags can have a 50% failure rate, so what are you waiting for?

title: UK competition watchdog launches review of AI market
description: Regulator will examine technology behind software such as ChatGPT.

title: HDDs typically failed in under 3 years in Backblaze study of 17,155 failed drives
